title: Tech Conference 2025
subtitle: A gathering to discuss the present and future of technology in Brazil. Talks with experts, innovative project presentations, networking, and technical debates. 📍 Convention Center - Main Auditorium - 06/14/2025
subscriptionEndAlert: ⏰ Registration closes on 05/31/2025 - Last spots available!
cta: If you want to be among those shaping the future of technology in the country, this event is for you. Stay tuned for registration and be part of this transformation! 💡
